api_key.title: Rachio API Key
api_key.description: Rachio API key, see https://rachio.readme.io/docs/authentication for help.

default_runtime.title: Default Runtime in Minutes
default_runtime.description: Default number of minutes to run zone

use_irrigation_display.title: Display as Irrigation System in HomeKit
use_irrigation_display.description: Display accessory in HomeKit as a irrigation system with sprinker zones. If unchecked; zones will display as single/separate tiles. Changing this will require this accessory to be removed from cache in homebridge settings

external_IP_address.title: External IP Address
external_IP_address.description: External IP address for this server, used to receive webhook requests. To find this quick https://www.myexternalip.com may be of help

external_webhook_port.title: External Webhook Port
external_webhook_port.description: External port or source for receiving webhook requests. Your router will need to forward this port to your internal webhook port.

internal_webhook_port.title: Internal Webhook Port
internal_webhook_port.description: Internal port or destination for receiving webhook requests.

delete_webhooks.title: Delete current webhook IDs
delete_webhooks.description: Use this if there is a need to delete an old webhook IDs that may be causing problems. Such as errors for 'Webhook received from an unknown external id`
